[[fr:Chandigarh]] [[sv:Chandigarh]]

'''Chandigarh''' is a city in [[India]] that serves as the [[capital]] of two states: [[Punjab, India|Punjab]] and [[Haryana]]. However, the city does not belong to either state. Rather, the city is administered by the federal government and hence classified as a [[union territory]]. '''Chandigarh''' is also the name this union territory.

Chandigarh is a [[planned city]], like [[Gandhinagar]], the capital of [[Gujarat]].

Several buildings in Chandigarh were designed by the Swiss [[architect]] [[Le Corbusier]] in the 1950s.

''This article is a [[Wikipedia:Perfect stub article|stub]]. You can help Wikipedia by [[Wikipedia:Find or fix a stub|fixing it]].''
